summary: This is a forwarded email from February 20, 2019, notifying recipients that the U.S. government is closed due to weather, as indicated by an OPM (Office of Personnel Management) site update. The document appears to be administrative in nature and does not contain substantive information related to the Epstein case.

events.title: Government Closure Announcement
events.description: An email was sent notifying recipients that the U.S. government is closed, as updated on the OPM site, likely due to weather (snow dismissal procedures).

keyFacts: The document is an administrative email about a U.S. government closure on February 19-20, 2019.
It references the OPM (Office of Personnel Management) website for snow dismissal procedures.
The email appears to have been forwarded within an organization, possibly law enforcement (CID/FBI), but contains no case-specific information.
No individuals, events, or locations related to the Epstein case are mentioned in this text.
